  • Resources

    We're capturing our events, curating materials from our community and sharing them on our Notion site. If you have relevant reading, viewing or listening to share just send it to us using this form.

  • Powered by Buttondown.

  • Design and Economics launched in 2021 with an unconference supported by Ravensbourne University, London.

  • Design and Economics has been shaped by ideas, guidance and input from Mark Simpkins, Simon Gough, Paul Sternberg, Sally Brazier, Victoria Hands, Jim Coleman, Joanna Boehnert, Tanvi Yardi, Kas Moreno Madrigal, Leonardo Gentili and Zarida Zaman.
